front.title: Requirements for OAM in MPLS Transport Networks

abstract.t: This document specifies requirements for OAM (Operations and Management) functionality in MPLS networks that are used for packet transport services and network operations. The use of the term MPLS in this document refers to both MPLS PSNs and pseudowire technologies. These requirements are derived from the set of requirements specified by ITU-T and first published in the ITU-T Supplement Y.Sup4 [6].
